entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
